meta.name: The Challenge
meta.description: Set in the middle of the jungle, "The Challenge: War of the Worlds 2" returns to a classic team format; 14 Brits will battle it out against 14 Americans for their share of the $1 million-dollar prize.

videos.title: Finale Part II
videos.overview: The finalists must rely on their partner and battle through pain, sweat and tears to become Challenge Champions. Only one team will be the first to ascend a treacherous path to a peak in the Andes Mountains where a share of $500,000 awaits them.

videos.title: The Scariest Mission of All Time
The Good, the Bad, and the Notorious
Showdown at the Real World/Road Rules Corral
Battle Scars: From the Gauntlet to the Inferno
He Says/She Says: Battle for the Battle of the Sexes 2
To Hell and Back: Hot Gossip from the Inferno II
Tire Me Up, Tire Me Down
The Good, the Brad, and the Ugly
Real World/Road Rules Challenge Fresh Meat Reunion
Trim the Fat: The Gauntlet III Reunion
Duelers on the Verge of a Nervous Breakdown
Thai Me Up! Thai Me Down!
Czech Yourself Before You Wreck Yourself
At the End of the World
What's Love Got to Do with It?
Will You Still Love Me Tomorrow?
The Perks of Being a Rookie
I Do Not Like You Sam I Am
I Like to Move It, Move It
ChallengeMania: The Road to Rivals II
Revenge is a Dish Best Not Serve
Free Agents - Live Free or Die
Strike a Pose, There's Something to It
There Will Be Blood
videos.overview: The cast arrives in Turkey, and learns they will be competing alongside their families; a scandalous hookup occurs; brothers clash.

videos.title: Corneesa
videos.overview: Cara Maria's ex enters the game with his brother; a veteran confronts her rookie hookup, and hears difficult confessions.

videos.title: A House Divided
videos.overview: The divide between the veterans and a team of rookies comes to a head; KellyAnne's allegiance sets another veteran off and their insults cross the line.

videos.title: Dirty Little Secret
videos.overview: One team's performance falls apart when they fail to communicate during the challenge; Bananas pulls a jaw-dropping move that makes the entire house question his loyalty.

videos.title: Blood Brothers
videos.overview: Abram confronts Cara Maria and reaches a boiling point; voting results fuel existing animosity; an intense elimination ensues.

videos.title: Blood is Thicker Than Mud
videos.overview: CT and Diem's sister Faith join the cast to pay tribute to Diem and Knight; Bananas worries that his strategy is backfiring.

videos.title: Blood Versus Love
videos.overview: The participants travel to Bodrum, Turkey to join family members who know their strengths, weaknesses and fears.

videos.title: Out for Blood
videos.overview: Players are reunited with their bloodline teammates and compete in an endurance challenge; the competitors learn of a location change.

videos.title: Tear Down This Wall
videos.overview: After arriving in Berlin, tension causes players to lash out at one another; competitors must race across speeding trucks.

videos.title: True Blood
videos.overview: The final three teams learn they will be competing in a major city; winnings are on the minds of the players while they prepare for the finale.

videos.title: Family Matters
videos.overview: In the Season 27 finale, the competitors endure a series of demanding checkpoints while battling all day and all of the night for their share of the $350,000 prize.

videos.title: Reunion
videos.overview: Bananas, Aneesa, Cara Maria and other cast members discuss hook-ups, fights and relationships on the show.

videos.title: Mexican Standoff
videos.overview: Meet the veterans and rookies from The Challenge, The Real World, and Are You The One? as they discover that in order to win the $350,000 grand prize, they'll have to work with their worst enemy.

videos.title: The Curse of the Black Skull
videos.overview: The cast ventures into The Elimination Jungle for the first time, which means alliances are forming, hookups are hot, and friendships are already falling apart.

videos.title: The Replacements
videos.overview: Replacement rivals enter the house; challengers must work with a rival in an awkward and intimate challenge.

videos.title: Stand by Me
videos.overview: A late-night incident threatens to turn physical; and the contestants are taken aback by the serious implications. In other events, the cast is pulled into a last-minute challenge.

videos.title: Let Sleeping Dogs Wake
videos.overview: Sleep deprived and mentally broken, the house begins to divide as teams band together to plot against others.

videos.title: Digging Your Own Grave
videos.overview: An attempt to hide an alliance threatens friendships, and families within the house.

videos.title: Rivals: Civil War
videos.overview: Two teams are sent home, and the remaining Challengers need to step up in order to keep themselves in the game.

videos.title: Raging Bullies
videos.overview: The rivals must work hand-in-hand in their last Mexican challenge to avoid elimination before heading to Mendoza, Argentina.

videos.title: Grapes. Wrath
videos.overview: One final elimination will determine which three pairs will continue on to the final challenge; participants are in for a surprise.

videos.title: Reunion
videos.overview: "Rivals III" competitors reflect on their experiences.

videos.title: Gimmie Shelter
videos.overview: Underdogs arrive in Thailand; the players adjust to living conditions.

videos.title: Skeletal Fracture
videos.overview: The Champions prepare to invade the game.

videos.title: Helter Shelter
videos.overview: Cory takes a risk to earn his ticket to The Oasis; during an elimination, a player's nerves become too much to handle.

videos.title: Four Tickets to Paradise
videos.overview: Paranoia gets the best of Shane and causes him to lash out; LaToya and Nelson bond as the last four tickets to the Oasis are awarded and the players are ecstatic to finally move out of The Shelter.

videos.title: Underdog Eat Underdog World
videos.overview: The Underdogs are shocked to see the Champions enter the game; Nelson rages after a rejection; after wetting the bed, a player loses her suitor.

videos.title: The Mile-High Club
videos.overview: Nelson rages when things do not go his way; a player wets her bed; Jenna wants to rekindle a relationship with her ex-boyfriend.

videos.title: Go Your Own Way
videos.overview: The Underdog alliances begin to unravel; Hunter's motives for flirting with Ashley are questioned; TJ surprises the competitors with a twist.

videos.title: The Bloodbath
videos.overview: The Underdogs must prove they are worthy of the final; a friendship turns into a rivalry when suspicious game-play is revealed.

videos.title: Caged
videos.overview: The Champions and the Underdogs must rely on their teammates to navigate a maze course; tempers flare for the Champs.

videos.title: Math is Hard
videos.overview: Camila and Cory's love affair gets tested when they work together; the Underdogs and the Champs need to rely on each other to finish.

videos.title: The True Champions
videos.overview: After a grueling three-day Final, the winners of Invasion of the Champions are revealed.

videos.title: Dirty 30: Thirty Rotten Scoundrels
videos.overview: Players arrive in Cartagena, Colombia, to compete for $1 million.

videos.title: Dirty Little Secret
videos.overview: Hunter and Cory must face off in elimination; the Challengers take part in a trivia challenge; cast members get caught in a compromising position.

videos.title: Rampage
videos.overview: A kiss sends shock waves through the house; a player crosses the line with nasty comments, and her competitors refuse to let it slide; a physically demanding elimination requires more than just strength.

videos.title: The Heart is a Lonely Hunter
When Worlds Collide
videos.overview: Challengers compete for a share of $500,000.

videos.title: The Power of Three
videos.overview: Three players earn power which makes their vendettas worry about being easy targets; Marie's romance with Kyle becomes threatened; TJ reveals a twist.

videos.title: Banatalie
videos.overview: Natalie tries to balance romance and a desire to prove herself; Melissa finds comfort with Nicole; Kayleigh questions Melissa's motives.

videos.title: Pizzagate
videos.overview: Brad and Britni plan to win the game while the others plot their demise; a player gets caught stealing.

videos.title: Notes on a Scandal
videos.overview: A mysterious player leaves mean notes in the girls' room, causing havoc with their game as they all try to figure out the culprit; the bromance between Victor and Shane fractures into a newfound vendetta.

videos.title: Pulling the Strings
videos.overview: When the mysterious and offensive notes continue to circulate the Challenge house, they cause a stir among the female competitors and the culprit finally gets revealed; when four Challenge legends return, the game turns upside-down.

videos.title: Mercenaries of Mayhem
videos.overview: Challenge legends continue to wreak havoc on the game; one player uses the power of the grenade to threaten the competition, creating a powerful vendetta in the process.

videos.title: Baskets of Deplorables
videos.overview: One player's humiliating performance may cost her the game when she gets shamefully stuck in a basket. Devin vows to wage war against his enemy, Bananas.

videos.title: Vendettas Never Die
videos.overview: With $500,000 on the line, the eight finalists compete for their share of the big money. However, two mercenaries return to make their road that much harder.

videos.title: The Challenge: Vendettas Finale (1)
videos.overview: After facing one of the most intense mental and physical final challenges everâ€¦ our vicious Vendettas cast members are reunited for the greatest, grimiest grudge-fest in MTV history.

videos.title: The Challenge: Vendettas Finale (2)
videos.overview: The insanity and intensity continues in the second hour of the Finale with the most feuds and fights in the history of The Challenge. Our four finalists will find out who will be crowned the solo champion for the first time

videos.title: Six Feet Under
videos.overview: Kicking off the final chapter of a three-season saga, the challengers must literally dig up old vendettas and put aside bitter feuds to compete for a million-dollar prize.

videos.title: The Young and the Wreckless
videos.overview: Kam and Kayleigh's fate is revealed after their teammates' fight put their future in jeopardy, and exes Britni and Chuck try to resolve their issues.

videos.title: Crazy Ex-Girlfriend
videos.overview: Everyone is on edge about the elimination, Kyle gets closer to Faith, Britni has a hard time letting go, and Shane's social media meltdown may come back to haunt him.

videos.title: The Affair
videos.overview: With a chance to re-enter the game on the line, the return of the Double Cross puts the Redemption House on edge, and Paulie has a plan to wreak havoc on a relationship.

videos.title: Breaking Brad
videos.overview: Accusations about Britni and Chuck irk Brad, a fight over a lack of initiative imperils CT and Veronica's partnership, and a purge challenge raises the stakes.

videos.title: A Series of Unfortunate Events
videos.overview: Brad struggles to move past the rumors about Britni and Chuck, CT strategizes, and Kyle screws over Cara Maria -- twice.

videos.title: Big Little Lies
videos.overview: The results of the elimination vote take almost everyone by surprise, the challengers must dig themselves out of a mine shaft, and "Queen" Kam devises an elaborate scheme.

videos.title: Shaneless
videos.overview: Shane sets out to stir up drama in the house and on the field, and Faith has a change of heart about Kyle after learning about his latest hookup.

videos.title: Bro-ing Pains
videos.overview: Ahead of a shocking elimination vote, Marie is consumed by paranoia, Johnny Bananas and Da'Vonne look to disrupt alliances, and CT seeks a new way to motivate his teammate.

videos.title: Redemption House of Cards
videos.overview: Johnny Bananas's relationship with Angela is questioned, CT tries some "polidicking," and the contestants wolf down a disgusting meal in the Dunking for Dinner challenge.

videos.title: You're the Worst
videos.overview: Tensions boil over between Cara Maria and the Lavender Ladies after a night out, and the players are tasked with repairing a rope bridge 1,000 feet in the air.

videos.title: Wheel of Fortune
videos.overview: Bananas and Tony struggle with being the odd men out in the game. A twist in the Double Cross leads to a twisted plan that blow up in one team's face. Two results of the elimination round send shockwaves through the game.

videos.title: The Leftovers
videos.overview: A debaucherous night ends in total chaos as simmering tensions throughout the game finally boil over. The players face off in "Hit List" where their trivia skills are put to the test.

videos.title: It's Always Sunny in South Africa
videos.overview: The Redemption House erupts when enemies come face to face; a season-long grudge match is finally settled when two power-house teams must battle for survival; players compete in the "Rolling Thunder" challenge.

videos.title: The Walking Dead
videos.overview: Alliances are dissolved as every team fights to earn their way into the finals; Paulie and Cara Maria's season-long flirtation turns into something more; TJ reveals a shocking twist regarding the Final Challenge.

videos.title: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?
videos.overview: The Challengers come face to face with their ultimate Final Reckoning as the four remaining teams of Vendettas compete to take home the million dollar prize in a grueling, epic, and completely shocking Final Challenge.

videos.title: To All the Partners I've Loved Before
United We Stand, Divided We Fall
videos.overview: A shocking twist at the challenge leads to an unexpected result; Josh he toys with a decision that could lead to serious consequences; Rogan and Theo's rivalry erupts into a heated confrontation.

videos.title: Benedict Laurel
videos.overview: Divisions on both teams come to light during the "Relic Runner" challenge; Laurel and Cara Maria's long-standing feud takes center stage; Bear and Georgia begin to flirt once again, leading Josh to question if he has a shot.

videos.title: Zero Dark Turbo
videos.overview: Team UK hopes to turn the tide against a dominant Team USA during the "Resilient River Run" challenge; Jordan says the wrong thing to Turbo,sparking a dangerous rivalry and a heated confrontation.

videos.title: All Is Fair in Love and War
Dee-Day
videos.overview: A "Puzzling Swim" purge challenge sends shockwaves through the game; Dee sets out to prove that she is not the weak link; one player uses a brilliant strategy during the "End of the Rope" elimination.

videos.title: A Tale of Two Countries
videos.overview: Endurance, puzzles, and math put Team USA and Team UK to the ultimate test; one player has a shocking and disastrous gas-out that threatens to sink their team.

videos.title: Give Me Liberty or Give Me Cash
videos.overview: Team USA wonders if it can still catch up with Team UK; a shocking twist spells doom for multiple players; the reveal of the million-dollar winners.

videos.title: Sweet Dreams Are Made of Dee
A Hard Jay's Night
videos.overview: The Challengers blow up trucks during the Decode and Detonate challenge; Jay finds himself in the middle of a dangerous love triangle that could result in his demise; Wes and Bananas' alliance faces its first true test.

videos.title: Karma Chameleon
videos.overview: Bear seeks to prove that no one can extinguish the fire that he has burning for Kailah; Ashley and Mattie get into a heated argument; the players compete in the freezing Cold War challenge, which proves too chilling for one person.

videos.title: Total Madness: Break Up With Your BF, I'm Bored
videos.overview: During the Bomb Squad challenge, teams of Challengers must work together to detonate an explosion; Rogan seeks vengeance on Jay; Jordan and Wes get into a heated argument involving deli meat.

videos.title: Should I Stay or Should I Go?
Victim of Love
videos.overview: Nany and Kaycee's budding relationship brings out a shocking side of Bayleigh, as well as some alleged tea about Kaycee and Bayleigh's past; two women compete for their Red Skull in the brutal Off With You Heads elimination.

videos.title: Crash Into Me
videos.overview: One player engages in sloppy political maneuvering, while another takes a shocking gamble to save a friend; competitors must fight for survival in the elimination game Hall Brawl.

videos.title: It's the End of the World as We Know It
videos.overview: After a season of grueling challenges and brutal eliminations, the nine finalists compete for their share of the $1 million prize.

videos.title: Reunion
videos.overview: The challengers reunite virtually for the first time since the finale to break down the strategy, expose the snakes, and address the madness from season 35.

videos.title: License to Killer Kam
videos.overview: Thirty elite agents learn that they will be battling against one another in a twisty, spy-themed season, with the hopes of earning their share of a $1,000,000 prize. former champions find themselves in danger, as a cutthroat plan emerges against them

videos.title: Duplicity
videos.overview: Loyalty is tested in a volatile new partnership. Agents must put their intel skills to the test while in a lava tunnel during "Mission: Drone Control." A stunning battle in The Crater causes ripples that will impact numerous Agents.

videos.title: The List
videos.overview: The international agents rescue the Americans, two veterans reveal their unexpected off-season hookup, and a mysterious list sends ripples throughout the house.

videos.title: Bertha
videos.overview: The international agents rescue the Americans, two veterans reveal their unexpected off-season hookup, and a mysterious list sends ripples throughout the house.

videos.title: Truce or Dare
videos.overview: Big T's loyalties come into question, an intense diving challenge results in multiple injuries, and a desire for revenge tempts the Agency to smash the veterans' alliance.

videos.title: Messy
videos.overview: Amber seeks to affirm her spot in the "Big Brother" alliance, a split-second decision during Undercover Comms tests a friendship, and elimination gets personal.

videos.title: Good Vibes and Gladiator
videos.overview: The muddy "Mindfield" mission dirties up the game when players must use their brains and brawn in order to succeed. Two Rookie players debate making a very risky move in order to secure a strong partner.

videos.title: Alien
videos.overview: Kaycee plans a romantic date for Nany, agents must solve puzzles while strapped to the tops of spinning cars, and a stolen pizza leads to all-out war.

videos.title: Uncle CT
videos.overview: Emy charts a risky gambit to steal her "dream partner," the house nervously awaits TJ's ruling on the pizza incident, and a legendary elimination game gets a new twist.

videos.title: The Threat
videos.overview: Berna and Hughie hope to win the Dive Bomb challenge and finally break the vets' alliance, Amber considers a risky move in pursuit of revenge, and two teams Race to Escape in elimination.

videos.title: The War
videos.overview: No longer protected, the vets must devise new strategies, the teams get down and dirty in Bombshell Battle, and Cory's cozy relationship with the rookies raises eyebrows.

videos.title: Precious Stones
videos.overview: Big T and Logan don't see eye-to-eye on their relationship, TJ changes the rules of the game during Diamond Dash, and a compromised player refuses to go down without a fight.

videos.title: Mucus Plug
videos.overview: The competitors speak to their families, the teams take leaps of faith while hanging over the Mediterranean Sea in Satellite Sabotage, and Kyle worries he's seen as an easy target.
On the 500th episode, the players transfer bags of cash to an end zone in a rigorous Brush Contact mission, and a vet causes dissension to coax a rookie into volunteering for elimination.

videos.title: Titanic
videos.overview: The Ruby Cell worries about how Amanda will affect their dynamic, the teams dive for underwater treasure in Sunken Intelligence, and history makes it hard for The Agency to nominate someone.

videos.title: Mavericks
videos.overview: Big T looks for a path off Team Ruby, the agents plunge into the danger zone Â during a "Top Gun"-themed challenge, and Josh gets caught picking favorites among his own team.

videos.title: The Cave of the Wolf
videos.overview: Emerald Cell tries bringing the fiercely independent Amanda into the fold, Devin feels betrayed by Tori's deal to help her new team, and Kyle's actions during Boom Raiders make him a pariah.

videos.title: Riverdance
videos.overview: Emy tries to heal the rift between CT and Kyle, the agents get a taste of the prize money as they compete in Million Dollar Heist, and the Emerald Cell seeks to avoid further infiltration.

videos.title: Drop Dead
videos.overview: Nelson questions Logan's trustworthiness, teams run across an elevated gauntlet in Dead Drop, and the men keep their heads down and try to avoid what may be the last elimination.

videos.title: Night of Mistakes
videos.overview: One player's weaknesses are exposed in elimination, and another gets the chance to show off their greatest strength, then it's every agent for themselves in an epic land-and-water final.

videos.title: The Decision
videos.overview: On the season finale, the remaining challengers split into two teams and face several puzzles as they close out day one of the final, and TJ introduces a new twist on day two.

videos.title: Spies, Lies & Allies: Reunion Parts 1 and 2
videos.overview: Maria Menounos gathers the agents to discuss Emy's plot to take CT from Berna and Amber's issues with the "Big Brother" alliance, and they finally learn who stole the frozen pizza.

videos.title: Don't Die for Me Argentina
videos.overview: Ride or Die partners hope to prove that their bonds can outlast the competition, as they battle for a massive cash prize; Laurel and Turbo get off on the wrong foot; TJ reveals a cutthroat twist disguised as a friendly gesture.

videos.title: Friend or Faux
videos.overview: Communication is key at the challenge, where one slip up could put pairs at risk; Turbo continues to be a menace but meets his match when an old friend becomes a new adversary; players receive a game changing shock that they never saw coming.

videos.title: A Bumpy Ride
videos.overview: Strength and endurance are tested at the Build Me Up challenge; Tori and Jordan try to make sense of their breakup; one player stumbles into messy territory when he flirts with multiple women; a Double Decker Hall Brawl stuns everyone.

videos.title: Olivin' on the Edge
videos.overview: A terrifying challenge is a must-win for a Ride or Die pair after their public betrayal paints a massive target on their backs. At-risk players plot an elaborate plan with the winning pair to keep themselves safe.

videos.title: Get Rich or Ride or Die Tryin'
videos.overview: A budding friendship is torn apart by betrayal. One player fears that she has made an enemy out of badass Laurel. Veronica reminds everyone why she is a dangerous force in the game.

videos.title: Come Michele or High Water
videos.overview: Michele and Jay find themselves in the hot seat after controversial decisions and hope for a win to survive. One player finds out that the man she was interested in has a girlfriend at home and so she seeks comfort with another.

videos.title: Deep Web
videos.overview: The political game intensifies as a web of deception causes problems for one crafty player. Brainpower and endurance is put to the test at the Peaking Blinders challenge. A blindside leads to a shocking elimination round.

videos.title: Born to Ride or Die
videos.overview: After a season of big moves, one pair of "Ride or Dies" finds themselves in the crosshairs of numerous teams; one player must choose between new love, old friendship, and playing a smart game.

videos.title: Split Decision
videos.overview: The challengers make it to the halfway point and TJ stuns them with a game-changing twist; Tori and Jordan's complicated relationship is thrown for a loop when one catches feelings for another player; winning power tears a pair apart.

videos.title: Dancing On My Own
videos.overview: With the Ride or Dies now on opposite teams, friendship and loyalty are put to the ultimate test; a high adrenaline challenge will separate the lions from the scaredy cats.

videos.title: Nelly: Ride (or Die) Wit Me
videos.overview: Nelson finds himself frustrated, powerless, and paranoid that he has no voice on his team; Nurys worries that her relationship with Jordan will alienate Tori and place a target on her back; TJ's favorite challenge sends the players spinning out.

videos.title: Frenemy of the State
videos.overview: After multiple losses, one team realizes that they must come together to win; after losing his Ride or Die in the last elimination, one player feels vulnerable to danger while another player must count on their Ride or Die.

videos.title: Blind Faith
videos.overview: Nany and Kaycee struggle with being on opposite teams; one player faces consequences after burning her vote instead of trying to protect her Ride or Die at all costs.

videos.title: Terrorist of Love
videos.overview: A nighttime challenge terrifies the challengers; Jordan and Tori's volatile relationship reaches a breaking point; TJ stuns the players with a twist they never saw coming.

videos.title: Knot a Problem
videos.overview: The remaining pairs hoping to earn their spot back in the game must face off in a classic Challenge elimination. Ride or Dies must quickly readjust to a change in the game. One pair of Ride or Dies makes a risky decision.

videos.title: Friends or Froze
videos.overview: With the final challenge quickly approaching, players worry that they have let a champion skate by for far too long; the winning pair is conflicted on which team they should nominate for elimination.

videos.title: Riders on the Storm
videos.overview: With four pairs of Ride or Dies remaining, TJ reveals the shocking details of their grueling 100-hour final challenge; Nany and Bananas struggle to communicate efficiently, putting them at risk.

videos.title: The Hours
videos.overview: An injury threatens one pair's fate in the game, a gruesome feast brings out the competitive eater in one player and the tensions between a Ride or Die pair leads to an explosive argument.

videos.title: The End of the Ride
videos.overview: A brutal final elimination sends one pair out of the game just before the last push of the final. One Ride or Die pair takes home the one-million-dollar prize and title of Challenge Champion.

videos.title: Reunion Part 1
videos.overview: Maria Menounos is back and so are the dreaded daggers.

videos.title: Reunion Part 2
videos.overview: The Ride or Dies settle unfinished business; a familiar face makes a surprise appearance.

videos.title: Teamwork Makes the Perfect Work
videos.overview: After a wet and wild night in the arena, the contenders learn that they will have to play together as a team; relationships form as they move into the house.

videos.title: Two Lungs, One Heart, Can't Lose
videos.overview: The contenders go out on a limb, and some are left hanging as they continue to work together; with a house divided by nations, lines are beginning to be drawn; one contender hopes their allegiances will keep them safe.

videos.title: It's A Matter of Semantics
videos.overview: After betraying their alliance, one contender does damage control; love is in the air as two contenders get to know each other; an argument disrupts the house, putting two contenders in the spotlight for the house vote.

videos.title: I'm Coming Out
videos.overview: A water challenge tests the Contenders' swimming abilities. One Contender celebrates her truth and coming out to her fellow contenders while another struggles with temptation in the house.

videos.title: Countdown To Chaos
videos.overview: When Chaos enters the room, the game is flipped upside down as Contenders learn they will have to face Challenge Champions in the Arena.

videos.title: The Big Mistake
videos.overview: Head on down to your local bingo hall because we're playing BINGO - Challenge Style. Contenders get down and dirty, and tensions mount as they wrestle for power. Another Champ enters, hoping to end one Contender's dream.

videos.title: So Flip Floppy
videos.overview: In a move of desperation, one contender tries to prove his loyalty to his alliance by betraying his other friends; love is in the air as one of the couples take their relationship to a new level.

videos.title: Struggling to Hold it Together
videos.overview: A rigorous and exhausting challenge sees one contender give their blood, sweat and tears for the win; an intense night out finds a contender in the firing line after another reaches their boiling point.

videos.title: A Banana Split
videos.overview: Cracks in the alliances begin to show themselves as one Contender works to flip the house vote. Multiple romantic scandals come to a head as one of the Contenders is confronted about being unfaithful.

videos.title: Feeling Used
videos.overview: The Contenders soar to new heights in a sky high challenge, with an outcome that makes one Contender question their alliance. A decorated Champion brings the heat in the elimination.

videos.title: My Own Worst Frenemy
videos.overview: One contender is shocked when their alliance nominates them for elimination, another player has a feeling their past is catching up with them, and one couple takes it to the next level.

videos.title: A Legend Returns
videos.overview: Amidst a challenge high above water, one contestant is on the outs with their alliance, while another hopes to shift the game's power dynamic.

videos.title: El Saboteur
videos.overview: Chaos continues as a new alliance threatens to shift the power dynamics in the house.

videos.title: Don't Let TJ Decide
videos.overview: The end of Chaos is near and with alliances on the brink of collapse, a grueling minifinal awaits.

videos.title: Welcome to Conquest
videos.overview: The game intensifies as the contenders enter a new phase, leading to shocking new twists.

videos.title: Family Knows Best
videos.overview: A chaotic selection divides the house, forcing one contender to choose between their closest allies.

videos.title: Feel the Bern
videos.overview: The remaining contenders fight to secure their chance to become the next Challenge Champion.

videos.title: The Beginning of the End
videos.overview: The final seven contenders enter the Final, where they must face the three levels of the game again.

videos.title: Only One Gets the Crown
videos.overview: The final six Contenders compete for a place amongst the most esteemed competitors.

videos.title: Reunion Part 1
videos.overview: The battle is over and now it's time for phase four - closure.

videos.title: The Era Invitational, Part 1
videos.overview: The Challengers arrive at their first challenge, but are shocked when they learn they will start by competing within their eras; politics begin as players must plead their case to avoid elimination night.

videos.title: The Era Invitational, Part 2
videos.overview: The Challengers arrive to the Arena to see classic, brutal eliminations from each era awaiting them; 16 people will fight in the sand, only 8 will return; the losers learn they will be sent off with a parting gift of karma for the remaining players.

videos.title: A Fatal Era
videos.overview: After the large elimination, the eras must work together in order to keep their team safe from elimination; a gross feast awaits the competitors at their next challenge.

videos.title: My Trivia Era
videos.overview: Targets change the game as competitors must learn how to play without knowing if they'll be safe come the next elim; TJ's favorite challenge returns in the form of a Challenge history lesson; a questionable sudden death round.

videos.title: An Era Tradition
videos.overview: An exhausting challenge leaves an era questioning one of their own, while another era can't get on the same page; a long-standing rivalry between two teammates comes to a head and erupts; champions collide in a nail-bitin.

videos.title: My Real Friends Era
videos.overview: With alliances and deals brewing, one Challenger must decide between righting their past wrongs with a friend, or creating a divide amongst the eras they have chosen to work alongside.

videos.title: Trust in Your Era
videos.overview: The winners must make a heart-breaking decision as to which of their friends must fight in the elimination; target selection causes chaos as player numbers dwindle.

videos.title: The Era of the Gladiator
videos.overview: A battle erupts and the players must find their inner Gladiator to take out their competition and achieve glory and safety; a vote from one team causes friends to question whether they were ever on the same.

videos.title: An Era of One
videos.overview: Having seen their whole team lose in elimination, one challenger must hold their entire era on their back to earn safety; cracks in an alliance begin to form as relationships across eras create paranoia and uneasiness.

videos.title: A New Era
videos.overview: The game takes a huge turn as the Challengers must now work as individuals to claim victory, while still repping their era; a hot and grueling challenge has one person seeing double and another wishing they could use it as an ex.

videos.title: Payback Era
videos.overview: The targets are painted on three friends as they must scrape through an intense obstacle course in order to keep themselves safe; one player decides to blow up anyone's game who stands in their way.

videos.title: The Era of the Purge
videos.overview: The Challengers get their first taste of what a final could look like, while battling to avoid being purged from the game; one Challenger tries to put the final nail in the coffin for their foe.

videos.title: Best Friends 4Era
videos.overview: A rivalry heats up and no one is safe from the chaos that ensues; one Challenger tries to reignite their competitive flame to avoid elimination; best friends avoid facing off with one another.

videos.title: Swinging Era
videos.overview: A staple of "The Challenge" sees the players swinging for their safety in the game; one player attempts to break up a solid alliance in an attempt to save their friend.

videos.title: Thinking Thin Era
videos.overview: A win-or-go mentality infiltrates one alliance as the Challengers traverse tight quarters filled with bats and puzzles in an attempt to keep themselves safe.

videos.title: Must Win Era
videos.overview: Burger King joins the action as Challengers face a risky plunge and tough swim, with serious consequences if they fail.

videos.title: Location Change Era
videos.overview: The Challengers arrive to a beautiful new landscape where their dreams may come to a screeching halt; the players must stay afloat in an exhausting elimination.

videos.title: The End of An Era, Part 1
videos.overview: With all of the eras represented, the eight finalists begin TJ's final and must endure a gauntlet of intense checkpoints, while a big twist hangs over their heads.

videos.title: The End of An Era, Part 2
videos.overview: The epic, two-part Final comes to a close as the finalists battle for their chance at a share of one million dollars. An epic twist could see someone's dream taken away from them.

videos.title: Welcome to The Challenge
videos.overview: The newly formed pairs of Challenge Vets and New Threats must put their partnership to the test immediately; a rivalry causes chaos and uncertainty, leading to a drama-filled nominations; a nail-biting elimination sends shockwave.

videos.title: We Used to Hook Up
videos.overview: TJ throws a huge wrench in the players' plans, making an ever-changing game even more difficult; two challengers get hot and heavy, making another begin to boil over with jealousy; the elimination sees the first head banger.

videos.title: I Am The Challenge
videos.overview: One player's game is at risk, while their partner's competitiveness rears its ugly head and wishes it hadn't. The challenge tests the players' swimming skills for the first time.

videos.title: Wish I'd Been Practicing
videos.overview: The stakes are sky high, as one veteran shocks the house by getting last in the challenge. Hangnail, Gabe, looks to make a high risk move to earn back some favor. The challenge tests the players' sense of direction and sudoku.

videos.title: Pride Comes Before the Fall
videos.overview: The rivalry between vets and new threats heats up. Worlds collide when the sports-horror movie "HIM" from Director Jordan Peele gets in on the action! A New Threat is taken off guard when the challenge loser wants to swing big and take them out.

videos.title: Is He Throwing It?
videos.overview: A major player in the game is public enemy number one after it appears they were trying to throw the challenge. The shocking nominations expose where one player stands in the game and baffles another whose plan backfired.

videos.title: At Least Someone's Getting Laid!
videos.overview: Loose lips, sink ships! One player's inability to keep a secret puts a target on them. The first-ever Challenge Grand Prix sees a speedy go-kart and a series of mind-numbing puzzles. And things are starting to heat up between a vet and new threat!

videos.title: Justice for Leka
videos.overview: Karma comes for one veteran, as their challenge performance raises suspicions; the announcement of the Lock-In approaching pushes the challengers to determine who would be the best partner for the rest of the game.

videos.title: Does Anyone Want to Confess?
videos.overview: The Lock-In has arrived and the players must compete in a challenge favorite, the Mini-Final, to secure their permanent partner for the season; the opportunity to earn more points is at stake, however a Challenge first sees the players scrambling.

videos.title: A War Brewing
videos.overview: The players compete in their first challenge as permanent partners, and trivia is the staple; TJ's favorite, but they have never seen it done like this before; TJ introduces a huge twist that could throw a wrench in the game.

videos.title: A King of Kamikaze
videos.overview: The Stake a Claim twist creates paranoia amongst the house; the Challengers show off their speed and strength in a challenge that sees them walking the plank; an intense nominations draws the line in the sand.

videos.title: Punch You in Your Face
videos.overview: The epic movie, "The Running Man," with Glen Powell inspires today's challenge with chains, cars and detonators! After one player's failed attempt to stake a claim, everyone strategizes as to how they can use this wild twist to their advantage.

videos.title: They Are Like Cockroaches
videos.overview: The challengers are sent on the heist of a century to collect a key usingâ€¦ haystacks. This exhausting challenge is a crucial look into everyone's speed and endurance, and one team's performance is shocking to everyone.

videos.title: We Have to Boogie!
videos.overview: As the numbers whittle down, everyone's collective performance in the challenge becomes crucial because winning or losing takes a vote away from their alliance. How important is your own safety versus your team's safety?

videos.title: The Best Birthday Present
videos.overview: In a challenge filled with chains, the players must trust their partner 's driving skills to help them succeed. If you love rummaging through your junk drawer and unraveling cable, this elimination won't be one to miss.

videos.title: Am I Being Bamboozled?
videos.overview: The challengers must navigate a harrowing and pitch-black cave in hopes of earning safety. The teams in elimination must cram into a replica airplane bathroom - and it's not even close to the mile high club.

videos.title: Ten Toes Down
videos.overview: An argument creates tension in the house and reveals who's been playing honest and how devious the game can really be; a headbanger awaits the teams in elimination and it's more than just their life in the game.

videos.title: Finale Part I
videos.overview: After a grueling season, the final four teams have made it to TJ's Final. While battling exhaustion, the players must complete grueling runs, mind-numbing checkpoints and the ultimate temptation to become Challenge Champions. And that's only day one.

videos.title: Finale Part II
videos.overview: The finalists must rely on their partner and battle through pain, sweat and tears to become Challenge Champions. Only one team will be the first to ascend a treacherous path to a peak in the Andes Mountains where a share of $500,000 awaits them.
